QuestData.Title: Who's In Charge Here?
QuestData.Description: Dorli's filled me in on this crazy trogg-slave operation the kobolds have going, and if you haven't talked to her about it yet, I suggest you do.$B$BI'd like to get to the bottom of this. Literally! Whoever's running this show is bound to be at the bottom of the mine, calling the shots, and I want them dealt with.$B$BFind whatever crafty bugger is directing the geomancers and diggers and bring me back their head.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect the head of Foreman Sharpsneer.
QuestData.CompletionText: I don't suppose it was Moira down there? Miracles do happen.
QuestData.RewardText: That's a gnoll head. Are you trying to pull some funny business, $n?$B$BIf you're not, I've not the faintest idea what's going on here.
